Description:
For over 10 years, Zscaler has been disrupting and transforming the security industry. Our 100% purpose-built cloud platform delivers the entire gateway security stack as a service through 150 global data centers to securely connect users to their applications, regardless of device, location, or network in over 185 countries protecting over 3,900 companies and have detected 100 Million threats/day. We work in a fast-paced, dynamic and make it happen culture. Our people are some of the brightest and passionate in the industry that thrives on being the first to solve problems.  We are always looking to hire highly passionate, collaborative and humble people that want to make a difference.The Talent Sourcer will report to the Manager, Talent Acquisition will serve as a dedicated resource to build and manage our India candidate pipelines. The Sourcer will play a key role in our recruitment strategy and efforts as they help to build a strong pipeline of talent through innovative and proactive search techniques.

Zscaler has spent years building groundbreaking technology that’s improving the security posture of enterprises around the world. And while engineering teams have been building great Zscaler products, our G&A teams have been building Zscaler into a great company. The members of our GA teams have been working together to recruit the right people,
create the right culture and environment, and build a solid financial and legal foundation—all of which has brought us to an incredibly exciting stage with a lot of momentum driving us forward. Join us and you, too, will have the opportunity to be a part of the excitement and contribute to Zscaler’s growth and success in meaningful ways.

Responsibilities/What You’ll Do:Creatively source for talent, using various tools such as LinkedIn, job boards, search engines, and social networking.
Work closely with Recruiting and Hiring managers to identify key talent and evaluation of candidate skills against specific requisition descriptions.
Conduct phone interviews to pre-qualify candidates.
Develop and execute campaigns to attract active and passive job seekers.
Create and maintain a pipeline of top talent for existing and forecasted requisitions.
Review resumes for appropriate skills, experience, and knowledge that are relevant to our position requirements.
Maintain accurate and thorough documentation within the company’s candidate database.
Must be comfortable sourcing and identifying candidates throughout IndiaMaster’s Degree preferred or Relevant Degree
Should have 4-6 years exp in recruitment.
A positive, can-do attitude
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills
Ability to overcome challenging circumstances and still meet deadlines and deliverables
Excellent organizational skills & multi-tasking skills
Flexibility and ability to quickly change directions
Demonstrated integrity, maturity, professionalism, and sensitivity even in stressful situations
Proficient with MS Office Suite, Corporate Gmail, and video conferencing
Experience with Jobvite and LinkedIn Recruiter preferredPeople who excel at Zscaler are smart, motivated and share our values. Ask yourself: Do you want to team with the best talent in the industry? Do you want to work on disruptive technology? Do you thrive in a fluid work environment? Do you appreciate a company culture that enables individual and group success and celebrates achievement? If you said yes, we’d love to talk to you about joining our award-winning team.
